originalText.text: Better than first class on airlines, and no security lineups. Faster and more comfortable than flying. (Considering the amount of time spent at airports) The bus was extremely clean and spacious; it felt more like a private plane than a bus rental. I'm excited for the next ride with them!

text.text: Better than first class on airlines, and no security lineups. Faster and more comfortable than flying. (Considering the amount of time spent at airports) The bus was extremely clean and spacious; it felt more like a private plane than a bus rental. I'm excited for the next ride with them!

originalText.text: This is an excellent bus rental service. The bus is very comfortable. The snacks are delicious, and the seats are really comfortable. Wi-Fi is a godsend!! The driver and attendant are both pleasant and as a result this journey has exceeded my expectations in every way. TSA, cramped seats, unreliable Wi-Fi, and frequent announcements from flight staff and pilots were all things I didn't miss. It worked the entire time! I have already recommended them multiple times and will continue to do so!

originalText.text: We used Chartered Bus NYC’s services when traveling to a conference in Boston. The trip was both enjoyable and productive. I was able to complete the three-hour workday while traveling. The bus was extremely comfortable and had everything we needed, including Wi-Fi, space, quietness, air conditioning, coffee, and food. The attendant makes a significant difference since they ensure your comfort during the journey. I highly recommend this company!!

originalText.text: Everyone at my company recommends TSU Global Services. The corporate bus rental was an excellent choice it seems. Everyone is very happy with the way they were treated. The bus was great and the driver was very experienced. Thanks!
